div.p: WARWICK – In light of the COVID-19 pandemic affecting Rhode Islanders, Mayor Joseph Solomon has signed...

h3.a: Mayor Solomon Declares State of Emergency for the City of Warwick »

div.p: WARWICK – Mayor Joseph Solomon has declared a state of emergency for the City of Warwick, Rhode Island...

strong.a: Rhode Island Department of Health (RIDOH) and national public health officials latest response to coronavirus disease (COVID-19)

a.strong: PUBLIC COMMENT, August 14, 2019 - Click for more details

p.strong: Mayor Solomon’s commitment to the City of Warwick has been demonstrated by his championing of fiscal responsibility, promotion of economic development, ensuring superior City services, especially for the City’s senior community, and the protection of and accessibility to the City’s 39 miles of coastline.

div.span: Google names Warwick as Rhode Island's eCity
